item.title: [317 Delta] HELP or ADVICE [317 Delta]
item.dc:creator: @RSMASTER RSMASTER
item.description:
@RSMASTER wrote:

if (newNPC.npcType == ###) { if ((newNPC.absX == ####) && (newNPC.absY == ####)) { newNPC.TurnNpcTo(newNPC.absX -1, newNPC.absY); } }

im using this code to make npcâ€™s face the direction i want them to.

if i tele away or log out they turn to face south again, the only way to get them facing the way i want them to again is to re-compile the server.

i would like to be able to have them facing the direction i want them to be facing at all times >.> and not turn back to south when i leave that area.

also, iv been told, when i can see them facing lets say east, other people on the server have said there facing south.

any help would be much appreciated >.< thanks
